channel.title: Client help needed
channel.description:
i need to find out how to change what the client says when people login like in the chat box it says WELCOME to XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX <----server name the server owner is XXXXXXXXXXXXXX the coder is XXXXXXXXXXX etc etc etc
how can i change this information?
it is a 562 client
